experiment: all-forcing simulation of the recent past
grid: finite-volume grid with 0.9x1.25 degree lat/lon resolution
history: 2020-06-08T08:53:23Z altered by CMOR: Treated scalar dimension: 'height'. 2020-06-08T08:53:23Z altered by CMOR: Converted type from 'd' to 'f'.
institution: Research Center for Environmental Changes, Academia Sinica, Nankang, Taipei 11529, Taiwan
source:
TaiESM 1.0 (2018): 
aerosol: SNAP (same grid as atmos)
atmos: TaiAM1 (0.9x1.25 degree; 288 x 192 longitude/latitude; 30 levels; top level ~2 hPa)
atmosChem: SNAP (same grid as atmos)
land: CLM4.0 (same grid as atmos)
landIce: none
ocean: POP2 (320x384 longitude/latitude; 60 levels; top grid cell 0-10 m)
ocnBgchem: none
seaIce: CICE4
title: TaiESM1 output prepared for CMIP6
